channel.title: Need Vps Help PLEASE!
channel.description:
Hello everyone im Nietmeer
Yesterday i bought an Vps From the site [b]5ite.com [/b] But Can someone help me set the settings? if i close my Run.bat the server will close to :(

item.title: Need Vps Help PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

You need to install Mozilla Firefox and install Java. Hopefully you picked Windows Server 2008, and not 2003. If you’re still having issues, check you environmental variables. If you continue having issues, then that VPS company most likely doesn’t support game servers. You should research more before you spend the money.

Read full topic
